Information Technology and Engineering Staffing for West Region (Arizona, Nevada, California, Utah, and Texas) with retail, medium and enterprise level accounts. Focus on Direct Hire positions for Infrastructure, Development, and Engineering. CDI delivers staffing solutions and recruitment services to leading companies with operations around the world. We have 60 years of experience placing people in contract and full-time positions with clients in a broad range of industries with a specialization in IT and engineering recruiting with focus in the United States and Canada.

IT and Engineering Staffing for Arizona and Nevada MarketsCDI Corp. (NYSE:CDI) is an engineering and technology services firm providing client-focused solutions in select global industries. CDI provides global engineering and technology solutions and professional staffing services through its global business operations. The Company also provides staffing services through its franchised Management Recruiters International, Inc. (MRI) operating unit. Specialized Total Project Engineering Services across: Oil, Gas & Chemicals, Aerospace & Industrial Equipment, Government / Defense, Infrastructure / Kimball Cross-Industry Professional Staffing Services: Managed Service Provider (MSP), Recruitment Placement Outsourcing (RPO), Contract Staffing, Permanent Placement Cross-Industry Information Technology (IT) Solutions: Application Lifecycle Management, Service Management, Web Services, IT Security & Risk Management

Our goal is to provide human capital solutions that are comprehensive, easy to understand, and enhance an organization's overall performance with bottom line results. Our Team of Recruiters is dedicated to matching professional to employer and we do this with the utmost integrity and discretion, knowing that we have done our job when you are able to do yours. Our team of seasoned career development and staffing professionals understands that no two careers evolve in the same manner or pace and that no vacancy is identical to another.

We are financially strong with more than $238 million in sales annually, an additional $60 million in managed services and more than 20 years of consistent growth and profitability.  We have depth and size. We are ranked 16th among the largest staffing firms in the US by Staffing Industry Report and have a database of more than 500,000 resources with industry specific knowledge across all IT disciplines.We provide the following services to Fortune 500 companies and FTSE100 customers around the world in the agricultural, energy/utility, financial, government, healthcare, insurance and retail distribution industries.
Director of Talent, Valor IT and ACE Global Contact Centers

Valor IT is a leading Managed Services Provider & Cloud Integrator, servicing SMBs and Fortune 500 companies alike. Our customer satisfaction is testimony that providing outstanding service and support is the reason Valor IT continues to grow year after year. That’s why, with Valor IT, our customers become our partners. Our systems are hosted within world-class, SSAE 16 compliant data centers with operational processes designed to ensure compliance with ITIL and other industry security standards.We value our employees and believe in investing in our employees. Our team is ideal for enthusiastic and well-organized people with opportunities for advancement as the firm continues to grow. Our comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision, 401k and paid vacation and holidays, annual training benefits and professional development enables our consultants to remain current in the ever-changing technology arena. Plus, we offer a positive work environment, interesting assignments, and training programs to help ensure your success. Come work for the leader in cutting edge technology and see for yourself how we value our clients and employees alike.

summary: The Number 1 question I get in this industry is, "What makes you different?"​ Rather than bore you with how great and progressive my company is and blah blah blah...I have composed a list that I think is more helpful. And accurate. And "different"​.1.) I will NOT wear a suit to a client meeting. This is Arizona. It's hot. It's an outdated concept anyway.2.) I will NOT show up uninvited and try to meet with you. Your time is valuable. And so is mine. 3.) I WILL always treat my clients, prospects and candidates with respect. If you say, "don't call me, I'll call you,"​ then I respect that. If you say nothing, on the other hand, then I have free reign to be as annoying as I like until you tell me to stop. :)4.) I WILL send my clients, prospects and candidates pithy, off the wall and outside the box communication to lighten the mood. I have been known to send GIF's of women crying to illustrate my sadness when a someone won't return my call or email. You have been warned. 5.) I WILL make mistakes. I am only human. 6.) I WILL own up to my mistakes and do everything possible to correct them.7.) I WILL make you laugh. Even if we never do business together I promise to, if nothing else, provide comedic entertainment. 8.) I will NOT mislead you or take you down a path of no return. If I'm not the right recruiter for you, I'll tell you. Nicely. Usually. 9.) I will NOT take my position lightly. This is my career...not a job. However, I won't take it so seriously that I wind up with ulcers and grey hair. Okay, more grey hair.Areas of Expertise: Recruiting; Staffing; Temporary Placement; Executive Placement; Contract Staffing; Business Development. Industries of Expertise: IT; Manufacturing; Technology; Engineering; Accounting and Finance; Administrative; Call Center/Customer Service; Marketing; Sales; Management; Executive.Please feel free to contact me at patti.franco@cdicorp.com or at 480-766-0646
